name: Flask App
postCreateCommand: python -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && mkdir -p .vscode && echo '{"python.defaultInterpreterPath": "${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/python", "python.terminal.activateEnvironment": true}' > .vscode/settings.json
